content: Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Nov 2018First time HDB buyer, am considering resale instead of BTO due to location wise. Is it wise to go for resale flat as first time buyer?Considering that we will only get 10k grant for BTO with combined income. Seems like will get higher grant for resale flat with proximity and CPF grant. Budget for resale flat about 380,000 to 450,000.1 answerAnswerBump0

Teo See Hwa, MArketing Associate at PropnexLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 05 Nov 2018Property investment is about how much you sell not how much you buy.Whether HDB or private look at future development nearby, such as school, MRT, food centre, transport.HDB resale in Marine Parade and certain mature estate are not your normal resale HDB.0 comments0
